snippet.title: Hex of Steel - 4.0.0 - Trailer
snippet.description:
The game underwent a complete rebranding !
New name, new logo, new wallpaper, new price !
The game reached a whole new state of completion, quality, content, and we felt it was time for a change !
We hope you will love all of these new things, change log can be found here : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1240630/Hex_of_Steel/
